The ex-ale-tation of ale, the anciant lickquor of this realme. Or, A cleare definition of its effecatious operation in severall pates, arts, and professions. Mews, Peter, 1619-1706.
[2], 11, [1] p.
Printed by T. Badger, London : 1646.
In verse. Attributed to the Bishop of Winchester, Peter Mews, by Wing and DNB. Annotation on Thomason copy: "July 30". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
